methods.name: CanWriteSettings
methods.description: Check if modify system setting permission is granted.

methods.name: MaxBrightness
methods.description: Get Max brightness of user's phone. If max brightness not found, return 255.

methods.name: OpenWriteSettingsScreen
methods.description: Show screen for controlling which apps are allowed to write/modify system settings.

methods.name: RegisterOnChange
methods.description: After registering, you can detect the brightness and adaptive change.

blockProperties.name: Adaptive
blockProperties.description: Set brightness to adaptive or non-adaptive. Adaptive if true, otherwise non-adaptive.

blockProperties.name: Brightness
blockProperties.description: Set the brightness of user's phone. Minimum value is 0.

name: BrightnessTools
helpString:
This extension is created for changing the brightness of user's phone.
Created by WatermelonIce

My Profile in Kodular Community: My Profile
Support me by subscribing my YouTube Channel: WatermelonIce YouTube Channel

events.name: Changed
events.description: Triggered when detected any brightness or adaptive change. The param "changed" indicate what has change.
